start.message: Hello I can send you a message as often as you want from the currency you have chosen, and I can ensure that you are constantly informed of the market. You can terminate your subscriptions at any time or make changes to the frequency of receiving news. Quick Use: /follow You can start a new subscription with the command, or you can change the frequency of sending notifications of your existing subscription. /price You can find out the last price of the currency unit you want with the command. /subscriptions With the command, you can list all your subscriptions and see which channel you are on in the currency you subscribe to. /cancel You can terminate your subscription to the currency of your choice with the command. The subscription can then be restarted. /cancelall You can terminate all your subscriptions with the command.

cancel.selectCurency: Select the currency in which you want to cancel your subscription.
cancel.noSubscription: You do not have a subscription!

cancelAll.allUnsubscribed: All your subscriptions have been canceled!
cancelAll.noSubscription: You do not have any subscription!

FOLLOW.notificationFrequency: How often do you want to receive notifications from {0}?

TIME.MINUTE: You will receive a notifications every {0} minutes.
TIME.HOUR: You will receive a notifications every {0} hour.
TIME.HOURS: You will receive a notifications every {0} hours.
TIME.DAY: You will receive a notification once a day.
